listItem(address,uint256,uint256).details: Technically, we could have the contract be the escrow for the NFTs but this way people can still hold their NFTs when listef

params.nftAddress: : Address of the smart contract of the NFT
params.price: : Sale price of the listed NFT
params.tokenId: : The Token ID of the NFT

listItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Method for listing your NFT on the marketplace
